you can't upgrade straight from edgy to gutsy.  You need to upgrade to feisty first.
We're willing to take a look at it.  Pastebin your /etc/apt/sources.list

Have you actually used automatix?

alright, well, before upgrading, it's recommended that you backup your data, since automatix has been known to cause problems while upgrading.  There's no guarentee that it will, but its a possibility.
as for the list, it all looks in order as far as the ubuntu repos are concerned.
Which servers is it saying it can't connect to?  It should give you a URL, I just need a few.

alright, its the third party wine repo that is failing.  You should, if you plan on using third party wine in the future, use the winehq repo.  Here's a new sources.list you can use: http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/60116/
